text: Yehor Klymenchuk (; born 11 November 1997) is a Ukrainian football midfielder who plays for FC Lviv. ==Career== Klymenchuk is a product of FC Shakhtar and FC Metalurh Zaporizhya youth team systems. He made his debut for Metalurh Zaporizhya in the Ukrainian Premier League in a match against FC Dynamo Kyiv on 30 May 2015. ==References == ==External links== * * Category:1997 births Category:Living people Category:Footballers from Zaporizhia Category:Ukrainian footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:Ukrainian expatriate footballers Category:Ukrainian expatriate sportspeople in Belarus Category:Expatriate footballers in Belarus Category:Ukrainian Premier League players Category:FC Metalurh Zaporizhya players Category:FC Minsk players Category:FC Naftan Novopolotsk players Category:FC Kolos Kovalivka players Category:FC Avanhard Kramatorsk players Category:FC Olimpik Donetsk players Category:FC Lviv players
title: Yehor Klymenchuk
